prompt: Design a compact Follow/Followers List page with a light gray background (#F5F5F5) for a clean and professional look. The top app bar should have a light gray background, a black back arrow icon, a centered 'Followers' title in bold black text, and a black search icon. Place the 'Following' and 'Followers' tabs below the app bar as small, pill-shaped buttons, with 'Followers' selected (green background, white text) and 'Following' unselected (white background, green text). The scrollable list of user profiles should have a compact layout, with a smaller circular profile picture (48px diameter, no shadow) on the left, the user's display name in bold black text, and username in smaller gray text. The 'Follow' button on the right should be green with white text and rounded corners. Use minimal 8px padding and thin gray divider lines. The layout should use a Column structure with smooth tab interactions.
